name: Football Live
description: A streamlit application visualizing live football updates of Premier Leagure including current standings, top scorers, fixtures, etc.

name: Test Weaver
description: A web application to effortlessly create set of test cases in the desired testing framework using the power of LLMs.

name: LLM long range dependency resolver
description: A research study to resolve long range dependencies in extremely large datasets by performing prompt compression using selective context methodology.

name: Traffic Counter
description: An application that detects and counts vehicles in traffic using background separation techniques.

name: Traffic Sign Recognition System
description: A computer vision system to effectively identify traffic signs for real-time automated driver assistance.

name: Emotion Analyzer
description: Classifies text into 11 categories of emotions. Used in directing the voice tone in a text-to-speech converter app.

name: Product recommendation system
description: Simple review classification model to smartly recommend products to users based on reviews.
